data.actual_result: It takes a significantly long time to load the channels (Clearing the cache for the app fixes this issue, so the cache probably got corrupted)
data.expected_result: The channels load in a reasonable amount of time
data.short_description: Server channels take an extremely long time to load after updating
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you're not udpdated,  then update - Close out of Discord completely - Open discord - Switch to a server and open the channel drawer
